EmailTemplate.name: NUR-202211-HHS-Virtual-Health-Partner-LED-NURTURE.VHA02. Email Engaged w/ Infogr
EmailTemplate.subject: Can your virtual care tools stop workforce burnout?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Supporting healthcare heroes Is your clinical staff using the best possible tools to strike a sustainable work-life balance without sacrificing quality of care? The shift to virtual care has expanded access to care for people in need, regardless of location. However, many clinicians are still struggling with inefficient workflows and heavy administrative burdens, making it harder for them to deliver the best care to their patients—and themselves. Take our Virtual Health Quotient Assessment to see how your virtual care plan measures up, and find opportunities to improve the clinician experience. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
